thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 2 of 137
thread.title: Julie Turner

author: Julie Turner
title: Julie Turner
text:
We were very pleased with our host Daniel and can give nothing but praise for watching our babies! I was a lil skeptic about services like this and leaving my dog in the care of a stranger....yet we do that when they first get groomed, first get shots, first get to find a friend in a dog park so why now? They are our babies and we only want the best and we found that in Daniel. He even gave Nicholas his eye drops for us and let them sleep out of cage or on his bed....a true dog lover!
Julie
